Flub.Name: Terraces
Flub.Description: The number of terraces to create.

Flub.Name: Uniformity
Flub.Description: The uniformity of the vertical space between terraces.

Flub.Name: Steepness
Flub.Description: The steepness of the terrace edge.

Flub.Name: Intensity
Flub.Description: The strength of terracing applied to the terrace.

Flub.Name: Soft Falloff
Flub.Description: Softens the blend of the terrace edges with the base terrain.

Flub.Name: Reprocess
Flub.Description: Applies all processing twice for enhanced effect.

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the node's process.
